Pre-Game Insights: Hungary finished as undefeated leaders of Group G in the qualifiers for the European continental tournament and haven’t suffered a defeat since September 2022.
Turkey topped Group D with just one loss in the qualifiers.
This match is crucial for both teams to gain momentum and extend their unbeaten runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is set to take place at 3:45 PM ET on March 22, 2024, in the Puskás Aréna, Budapest, Hungary.
Weather conditions don't look ideal for the 2025 NHL Winter Classic, which could potentially get rescheduled.
The match can be watched for free via Fubo with a 7-day free trial.
